overview:
Ajay Mistry is the founder and CEO of Rafikee.com, which he started several years after he graduated from the University of California at Davis with a degree in Economics.

Ajay is responsible for setting the overall direction and product strategy for Rafikee.com. In addition to heading Rafikee.com’s growth efforts, he also plays an integral part with BeyondTek IT, a national IT staffing and consulting firm headquartered in Orange County, CA.
